_header: Look man to Jesu Christ I-nailed on the rood
_description: A paraphrase of ‘Respice in faciem Xi’, etc. — six irregular lines

Bod42.First Lines:
Loke man to iesucrist hi neiled an þo rodeAnd hi ƿitz his
                    nakede bodi red hi maked mid blode…
Bod42.Last Lines:
…þurch warm þu art i boruheþu mit hi uinde
                    blode an sorue
Bod42.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “With an O and an I.” 
             Anglia
         27 (1904): 283-319: 209.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 1.
